message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product. I'm excited to make you an offer. After careful consideration, I'm willing to sell the product to you for $11500. I believe this is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10000 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After re-evaluating the product's value, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $11000. I believe this price still reflects the product's worth, and I'm confident you'll find it a valuable addition to your collection.
